Where civics meets community

CityCamp is a global movement of community-focused events that foster civic collaboration and innovation.

Organize

Lead a CityCamp where you live.

Participate

Get involved with a CityCamp near you.

Sponsor

Support a CityCamp in-kind or financially.

Community

Join the CityCamp community.

Find

Find a CityCamp near you.

Help

Get CityCamp help.

Themes

CityCamp themes vary by event, but generally focus on these interest areas:

Arts

Civic engagement

Civic technology

Economics

Education

Environment

Housing

Human services

Open government

Safety

Emergency management

Health

Transportation

More
